00027 namespace boost {
00028 namespace xint {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00032 BOOST_XINT_INLINE int compare(const digit_t *b1, const digit_t *b2, size_t len,
00033     bool equal_only)
00034 {
00035     const detail::digit_t *b1i = b1 + len, *b2i = b2 + len;
00036     if (equal_only) {
00037         // If we only care whether it's equal or not, we'll start from the
00038         // lowest digit instead of the highest, on the assumption that it's more
00039         // likely to be different.
00040         while (b1 < b1i) if (*b1++ != *b2++) return 1;
00041     } else {
00042         while (b1i > b1)
00043             if (*(--b1i) != *(--b2i))
00044                 return ((*b1i < *b2i) ? -1 : 1);
00045     }
00046     return 0; // They're identical.
00047 }
00048 
00050 BOOST_XINT_INLINE int compare(const data_t b1, const data_t b2, bool ignoresign)
00051 {
00052     bool invert_answer=false;
00053     if (!ignoresign) {
00054         if (b1.is_zero()) {
00055             if (b2.is_zero()) return 0;
00056             return (b2.negative ? 1 : -1);
00057         } else if (b2.is_zero()) {
00058             return (b1.negative ? -1 : 1);
00059         } else {
00060             if (b1.negative != b2.negative) return (b1.negative ? -1 : 1);
00061             if (b1.negative) invert_answer=true;
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     int answer = 0;
00066     if (b1.length != b2.length) {
00067         answer = ((b1.length < b2.length) ? -1 : 1);
00068     } else {
00069         answer = compare(b1.digits(), b2.digits(), b1.length, false);
00070     }
00071 
00072     return (invert_answer ? -answer : answer);
00073 }
00074 
00076 BOOST_XINT_INLINE int compare_eq(const data_t b1, const data_t b2) {
00077     if (b1.negative != b2.negative) {
00078         // Have to test for is_zero here, because in some rare cases, negative
00079         // zero is allowed, and negative zero is equal to zero.
00080         return (!b1.is_zero() || !b2.is_zero() ? 1 : 0);
00081     }
00082     if (b1.length != b2.length) return 1;
00083     return compare(b1.digits(), b2.digits(), b1.length, true);
00084 }
00085 
00086 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool operator==(const data_t num1, const data_t num2) {
00087     return compare_eq(num1, num2)==0; }
00088 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool operator!=(const data_t num1, const data_t num2) {
00089     return compare_eq(num1, num2)!=0; }
00090 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool operator<(const data_t num1, const data_t num2) {
00091     return compare(num1, num2)<0; }
00092 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool operator>(const data_t num1, const data_t num2) {
00093     return compare(num1, num2)>0; }
00094 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool operator<=(const data_t num1, const data_t num2) {
00095     return compare(num1, num2)<=0; }
00096 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool operator>=(const data_t num1, const data_t num2) {
00097     return compare(num1, num2)>=0; }
00098 
00099 } // namespace detail
00100 } // namespace xint
00101 } // namespace boost
